blocks.name: trcl
blocks.content: For any set ` A ` , show the properties of its transitive closure ` C ` . Similar to Theorem 9.1 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 73 except that we show an explicit expression for the transitive closure rather than just its existence. See ~ tz9.1 for an abbreviated version showing existence. (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)

thm trcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- w3a(wss(c0, c1), wtr(c1), wal(s0, wi(wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0))), wss(c1, cv(s0)))))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wceq(c2, cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cun(cv(s1), cuni(cv(s1)))), c0), com))
  -| wceq(c1, ciun(s2, com, cfv(c2, cv(s2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  3pm3.2i(wss(c0, c1), wtr(c1), wal(s0, wi(wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0))), wss(c1, cv(s0)))))
  sseqtr4i(c0, c1, ciun(s2, com, cfv(c2, cv(s2))))
  ax-mp(wss(c0, ciun(s2, com, cfv(c2, cv(s2)))), wrex(s2, com, wss(c0, cfv(c2, cv(s2)))))
  mp2an(wrex(s2, com, wss(c0, cfv(c2, cv(s2)))), wcel(emptycls, com), wss(c0, cfv(c2, emptycls)))
  peano1()
  eqimssi(c0, cfv(c2, emptycls))
  eqtr2i(c0, cfv(c2, emptycls), cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cun(cv(s1), cuni(cv(s1)))), c0), com), emptycls))
  rspcev(s2, emptycls, com, wss(c0, cfv(c2, emptycls)), wss(c0, cfv(c2, cv(s2))))
  sseq2d(c0, cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c2, emptycls), wceq(cv(s2), emptycls))
  fveq2(cv(s2), emptycls, c2)
  ssiun(s2, com, c0, cfv(c2, cv(s2)))
  mpbir(wtr(c1), wtr(ciun(s2, com, cfv(c2, cv(s2)))))
  mpgbir(hs0, wtr(ciun(s2, com, cfv(c2, cv(s2)))), wal(hs1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(s2, com, cfv(c2, cv(s2))))), wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s2, com, cfv(c2, cv(s2)))))))
  dftr2(hs0, hs1, ciun(s2, com, cfv(c2, cv(s2))))
  ax-gen(hs1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(s2, com, cfv(c2, cv(s2))))), wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s2, com, cfv(c2, cv(s2))))))
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(s2, com, cfv(c2, cv(s2))))), wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s2, com, cfv(c2, cv(s2)))), wrex(s2, com, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, csuc(cv(s2))))))
  sylbi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(s2, com, cfv(c2, cv(s2))))), wrex(s2, com, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, csuc(cv(s2))))), wrex(s2, com, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(c2, cv(s2))))))
  bitr4i(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(s2, com, cfv(c2, cv(s2))))), wrex(s2, com, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(c2, cv(s2))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wrex(s2, com, wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(c2, cv(s2))))))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(s2, com, cfv(c2, cv(s2)))), wrex(s2, com, wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(c2, cv(s2)))))
  eliun(s2, cv(hs1), com, cfv(c2, cv(s2)))
  r19.42v(s2, com, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(c2, cv(s2))))
  reximia(s2, com, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(c2, cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, csuc(cv(s2)))))
  syl5(wcel(cv(s2), com), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(c2, cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, csuc(cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cfv(c2, cv(s2)))))
  elunii(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cfv(c2, cv(s2)))
  sseld(cv(hs0), cuni(cfv(c2, cv(s2))), cfv(c2, csuc(cv(s2))), wcel(cv(s2), com))
  syl5sseqr(cuni(cfv(c2, cv(s2))), cfv(c2, csuc(cv(s2))), cun(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cuni(cfv(c2, cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s2), com))
  ssun2(cuni(cfv(c2, cv(s2))), cfv(c2, cv(s2)))
  sylibr(wrex(s2, com, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, csuc(cv(s2))))), wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s2, com, cfv(c2, cv(s2)))), wrex(s2, com, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(s2)))))
  sylibr(wrex(s2, com, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, csuc(cv(s2))))), wrex(s2, com, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(s2)))), wrex(hs1, com, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))))
  rexlimiv(s2, com, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, csuc(cv(s2)))), wrex(hs1, com, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))))
  syl(wcel(cv(s2), com), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, csuc(cv(s2)))), wrex(hs1, com, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))), wcel(csuc(cv(s2)), com))
  peano2(cv(s2))
  ex(wcel(csuc(cv(s2)), com), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, csuc(cv(s2)))), wrex(hs1, com, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))))
  rspcev(hs1, csuc(cv(s2)), com, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, csuc(cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), cfv(c2, csuc(cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs1), csuc(cv(s2))))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), csuc(cv(s2)), c2)
  cbvrexv(s2, hs1, com, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(s2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1)))
  fveq2(cv(s2), cv(hs1), c2)
  eliun(s2, cv(hs0), com, cfv(c2, cv(s2)))
  ax-mp(wb(wtr(c1), wtr(ciun(s2, com, cfv(c2, cv(s2))))), wceq(c1, ciun(s2, com, cfv(c2, cv(s2)))))
  treq(c1, ciun(s2, com, cfv(c2, cv(s2))))
  ax-gen(s0, wi(wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0))), wss(c1, cv(s0))))

  com12(wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), com), wss(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))
  finds2(hs0, s2, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0))), wss(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(c2, emptycls), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(c2, csuc(cv(s2))), cv(s0)))
  sseq1d(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), cfv(c2, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, c2)
  sseq1d(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s2), c2)
  sseq1d(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), cfv(c2, csuc(cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s2))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(s2)), c2)
  adantr(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0)), wss(cfv(c2, emptycls), cv(s0)))

  sseq1i(cfv(c2, emptycls), cv(s0), c0)

  fveq1i(c2, emptycls, cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cun(cv(s1), cuni(cv(s1)))), c0), com))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, cun(cv(s1), cuni(cv(s1)))), c0), com), emptycls), c0), wcel(c0, universe))
  fr0g(c0, universe, cmpt(s1, universe, cun(cv(s1), cuni(cv(s1)))))
  adantld(wcel(cv(s2), com), wss(c0, cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0)), wi(wss(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(c2, csuc(cv(s2))), cv(s0))))
  com23(wcel(cv(s2), com), wtr(cv(s0)), wss(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(c2, csuc(cv(s2))), cv(s0)))
  syl9r(wcel(cv(s2), com), wss(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0)), wss(cfv(c2, csuc(cv(s2))), cv(s0)), wss(cun(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cuni(cfv(c2, cv(s2)))), cv(s0)))

  uneq12d(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cuni(cfv(c2, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s2))))

blocks.pretty:
thm trcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ Tr(c1)∧ ∀(s0,((c0 ⊆ s0 ∧ Tr(s0))→ c1 ⊆ s0)))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 =(rec((s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(s1 ⋃ ⋃ s1)), c0)|` _om)
  ⊣ c1 = ⋃(s2 ∈ _om,(c2 ` s2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  3pm3.2i(c0 ⊆ c1, Tr(c1), ∀(s0,((c0 ⊆ s0 ∧ Tr(s0))→ c1 ⊆ s0)))
  sseqtr4i(c0, c1, ⋃(s2 ∈ _om,(c2 ` s2)))
  ax-mp(c0 ⊆ ⋃(s2 ∈ _om,(c2 ` s2)), ∃(s2 ∈ _om, c0 ⊆(c2 ` s2)))
  mp2an(∃(s2 ∈ _om, c0 ⊆(c2 ` s2)), ∅ ∈ _om, c0 ⊆(c2 ` ∅))
  peano1()
  eqimssi(c0, (c2 ` ∅))
  eqtr2i(c0, (c2 ` ∅), ((rec((s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(s1 ⋃ ⋃ s1)), c0)|` _om)` ∅))
  rspcev(s2, emptycls, com, c0 ⊆(c2 ` ∅), c0 ⊆(c2 ` s2))
  sseq2d(c0, (c2 ` s2), (c2 ` ∅), s2 = ∅)
  fveq2(s2, emptycls, c2)
  ssiun(s2, com, c0, (c2 ` s2))
  mpbir(Tr(c1), Tr(⋃(s2 ∈ _om,(c2 ` s2))))
  mpgbir(hs0, Tr(⋃(s2 ∈ _om,(c2 ` s2))), ∀(hs1,((hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ∈ ⋃(s2 ∈ _om,(c2 ` s2)))→ hs0 ∈ ⋃(s2 ∈ _om,(c2 ` s2)))))
  dftr2(hs0, hs1, ⋃(s2 ∈ _om,(c2 ` s2)))
  ax-gen(hs1, ((hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ∈ ⋃(s2 ∈ _om,(c2 ` s2)))→ hs0 ∈ ⋃(s2 ∈ _om,(c2 ` s2))))
  syl((hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ∈ ⋃(s2 ∈ _om,(c2 ` s2))), hs0 ∈ ⋃(s2 ∈ _om,(c2 ` s2)), ∃(s2 ∈ _om, hs0 ∈(c2 ` suc(s2))))
  sylbi((hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ∈ ⋃(s2 ∈ _om,(c2 ` s2))), ∃(s2 ∈ _om, hs0 ∈(c2 ` suc(s2))), ∃(s2 ∈ _om,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ∈(c2 ` s2))))
  bitr4i((hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ∈ ⋃(s2 ∈ _om,(c2 ` s2))), ∃(s2 ∈ _om,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ∈(c2 ` s2))), (hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ ∃(s2 ∈ _om, hs1 ∈(c2 ` s2))))
  anbi2i(hs0 ∈ hs1, hs1 ∈ ⋃(s2 ∈ _om,(c2 ` s2)), ∃(s2 ∈ _om, hs1 ∈(c2 ` s2)))
  eliun(s2, hs1, com, (c2 ` s2))
  r19.42v(s2, com, hs0 ∈ hs1, hs1 ∈(c2 ` s2))
  reximia(s2, com, (hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ∈(c2 ` s2)), hs0 ∈(c2 ` suc(s2)))
  syl5(s2 ∈ _om, (hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ∈(c2 ` s2)), hs0 ∈(c2 ` suc(s2)), hs0 ∈ ⋃(c2 ` s2))
  elunii(hs0, hs1, (c2 ` s2))
  sseld(hs0, ⋃(c2 ` s2), (c2 ` suc(s2)), s2 ∈ _om)
  syl5sseqr(⋃(c2 ` s2), (c2 ` suc(s2)), ((c2 ` s2)⋃ ⋃(c2 ` s2)), s2 ∈ _om)
  ssun2(⋃(c2 ` s2), (c2 ` s2))
  sylibr(∃(s2 ∈ _om, hs0 ∈(c2 ` suc(s2))), hs0 ∈ ⋃(s2 ∈ _om,(c2 ` s2)), ∃(s2 ∈ _om, hs0 ∈(c2 ` s2)))
  sylibr(∃(s2 ∈ _om, hs0 ∈(c2 ` suc(s2))), ∃(s2 ∈ _om, hs0 ∈(c2 ` s2)), ∃(hs1 ∈ _om, hs0 ∈(c2 ` hs1)))
  rexlimiv(s2, com, hs0 ∈(c2 ` suc(s2)), ∃(hs1 ∈ _om, hs0 ∈(c2 ` hs1)))
  syl(s2 ∈ _om, (hs0 ∈(c2 ` suc(s2))→ ∃(hs1 ∈ _om, hs0 ∈(c2 ` hs1))), suc(s2)∈ _om)
  peano2(s2)
  ex(suc(s2)∈ _om, hs0 ∈(c2 ` suc(s2)), ∃(hs1 ∈ _om, hs0 ∈(c2 ` hs1)))
  rspcev(hs1, suc(s2), com, hs0 ∈(c2 ` suc(s2)), hs0 ∈(c2 ` hs1))
  eleq2d(hs0, (c2 ` hs1), (c2 ` suc(s2)), hs1 = suc(s2))
  fveq2(hs1, suc(s2), c2)
  cbvrexv(s2, hs1, com, hs0 ∈(c2 ` s2), hs0 ∈(c2 ` hs1))
  eleq2d(hs0, (c2 ` s2), (c2 ` hs1), s2 = hs1)
  fveq2(s2, hs1, c2)

blocks.name: tz9.1
blocks.content: Every set has a transitive closure (the smallest transitive extension). Theorem 9.1 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 73. See ~ trcl for an explicit expression for the transitive closure. Apparently open problems are whether this theorem can be proved without the Axiom of Infinity; if not, then whether it implies Infinity; and if not, what is the "property" that Infinity has that the other axioms don't have that is weaker than Infinity itself? (Added 22-Mar-2011) The following article seems to answer the first question, that it can't be proved without Infinity, in the affirmative: Mancini, Antonella and Zambella, Domenico (2001). "A note on recursive models of set theories." _Notre Dame Journal of Formal Logic_, 42(2):109-115. (Thanks to Scott Fenton.) (Contributed by NM, 15-Sep-2003.)

  mp2b(∃(s0,(c0 ⊆ s0 ∧ Tr(s0))), (c0 ⊆ ⋃(hs0 ∈ _om,((rec((hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs1 ⋃ ⋃ hs1)), c0)|` _om)` hs0))∧ Tr(⋃(hs0 ∈ _om,((rec((hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs1 ⋃ ⋃ hs1)), c0)|` _om)` hs0)))∧ ∀(s0,((c0 ⊆ s0 ∧ Tr(s0))→ ⋃(hs0 ∈ _om,((rec((hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs1 ⋃ ⋃ hs1)), c0)|` _om)` hs0))⊆ s0))), (c0 ⊆ ⋃(hs0 ∈ _om,((rec((hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs1 ⋃ ⋃ hs1)), c0)|` _om)` hs0))∧ Tr(⋃(hs0 ∈ _om,((rec((hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs1 ⋃ ⋃ hs1)), c0)|` _om)` hs0)))))
  trcl(s0, hs1, hs0, c0, ⋃(hs0 ∈ _om,((rec((hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs1 ⋃ ⋃ hs1)), c0)|` _om)` hs0)), (rec((hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs1 ⋃ ⋃ hs1)), c0)|` _om))
  eqid((rec((hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs1 ⋃ ⋃ hs1)), c0)|` _om))

  iunex(hs0, com, ((rec((hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs1 ⋃ ⋃ hs1)), c0)|` _om)` hs0))
  omex()
  fvex((rec((hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs1 ⋃ ⋃ hs1)), c0)|` _om), hs0)

  anim2d(wa(wtr(cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cin(cin(cv(hs1), c0), cv(s0)), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(s0), c0), emptycls))

  com23(wtr(cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wne(cin(cv(s0), c0), emptycls), wne(cin(cin(cv(hs1), c0), cv(s0)), emptycls))

  n0(hs2, cin(cv(s0), c0))
  exlimdv(hs2, wtr(cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cin(cv(s0), c0)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wne(cin(cin(cv(hs1), c0), cv(s0)), emptycls)))

  ancri(wcel(cv(hs2), cin(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(s0)))

blocks.name: zfregs
blocks.content: The strong form of the Axiom of Regularity, which does not require that ` A ` be a set. Axiom 6' of [TakeutiZaring] p. 21. See also ~ epfrs . (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2003.)

blocks.name: zfregs2
blocks.content: Alternate strong form of the Axiom of Regularity. Not every element of a nonempty class contains some element of that class. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 24-Oct-2011.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 27-Sep-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm zfregs2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wral(s0, c0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  sylnibr(wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c0, wn(wn(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))))
  sylib(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wral(s0, c0, wn(wn(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))), wrex(s0, c0, wn(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  sylib(wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, c0, wn(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), wrex(s0, c0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  sylib(wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, c0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cin(c0, cv(s0)), emptycls)))
  sylib(wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cin(c0, cv(s0)), emptycls)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s0), c0), emptycls)))
  zfregs(s0, c0)
  rexbii(s0, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s0), c0), emptycls), wceq(cin(c0, cv(s0)), emptycls))
  eqeq1i(cin(cv(s0), c0), emptycls, cin(c0, cv(s0)))
  incom(cv(s0), c0)
  rexbii(s0, c0, wceq(cin(c0, cv(s0)), emptycls), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  disj1(s1, c0, cv(s0))
  rexbii(s0, c0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wn(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  alinexa(s1, wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  dfrex2(s0, c0, wn(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wn(wn(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  notnotb(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: setind
blocks.content: Set (epsilon) induction. Theorem 5.22 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 21. (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2003.)
blocks.origin:
thm setind(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(c0, universe))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylibr(wal(s0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(c0, universe), wceq(cdif(universe, c0), emptycls))
  syl(wal(s0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(cdif(universe, c0), emptycls), wn(wrex(hs0, cdif(universe, c0), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0)), emptycls))))
  nrexdv(hs0, cdif(universe, c0), wal(s0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0)), emptycls))
  imp(wal(s0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0)), wn(wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0)), emptycls)))
  nsyli(wal(s0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0)), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0)), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl5bir(wal(s0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0)), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c0))
  ssindif0(cv(hs0), c0)
  spv(s0, hs0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  sseq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c0)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eldifn(cv(hs0), universe, c0)
  necon1bi(cdif(universe, c0), emptycls, wrex(hs0, cdif(universe, c0), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0)), emptycls)))
  zfregs(hs0, cdif(universe, c0))
  vdif0(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  diff.wi.s(s0, wss(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.wss.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(universe, c0))
}

thm setind(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0,(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0))→ c0 = 𝕌)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylibr(∀(s0,(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0)), c0 = 𝕌, (𝕌 \ c0)= ∅)
  syl(∀(s0,(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0)), (𝕌 \ c0)= ∅, ¬ ∃(hs0 ∈(𝕌 \ c0),(hs0 ⋂(𝕌 \ c0))= ∅))
  nrexdv(hs0, (𝕌 \ c0), ∀(s0,(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0)), (hs0 ⋂(𝕌 \ c0))= ∅)
  imp(∀(s0,(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0)), hs0 ∈(𝕌 \ c0), ¬(hs0 ⋂(𝕌 \ c0))= ∅)
  nsyli(∀(s0,(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0)), hs0 ∈(𝕌 \ c0), (hs0 ⋂(𝕌 \ c0))= ∅, hs0 ∈ c0)
  syl5bir(∀(s0,(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0)), (hs0 ⋂(𝕌 \ c0))= ∅, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ⊆ c0)
  ssindif0(hs0, c0)
  spv(s0, hs0, (s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0), (hs0 ⊆ c0 → hs0 ∈ c0))
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, s0 ⊆ c0, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ⊆ c0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  sseq1(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eldifn(hs0, universe, c0)
  necon1bi((𝕌 \ c0), emptycls, ∃(hs0 ∈(𝕌 \ c0),(hs0 ⋂(𝕌 \ c0))= ∅))
  zfregs(hs0, (𝕌 \ c0))
  vdif0(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0,(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0)))
  diff.wi.s(s0, hs0 ⊆ c0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c((𝕌 \ c0))
}

blocks.content: Value of the transitive closure function. (The fact that this intersection exists is a non-trivial fact that depends on ~ ax-inf ; see ~ tz9.1 .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jun-2013.)

thm tcvalg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(ctc, c0), cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, wceq(cfv(ctc, c0), cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0)))))), wceq(cfv(ctc, cv(hs0)), cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0)))))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(ctc, cv(hs0)), cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0))))), cfv(ctc, c0), cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ctc)
  inteqd(cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0)))), cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  abbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0))), wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0)), wss(c0, cv(s0)))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  mp2an(wceq(cfv(ctc, cv(hs0)), cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0)))))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0))))), universe))
  tz9.1c(s0, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  fvmpt2(hs0, universe, cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0))))), universe, ctc)
  df-tc(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(ctc, c0), cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wtr(cv(s0)))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm tcvalg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(TC ` c0)= ⋂ { s0 |(c0 ⊆ s0 ∧ Tr(s0))})
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, (TC ` c0)= ⋂ { s0 |(c0 ⊆ s0 ∧ Tr(s0))}, (TC ` hs0)= ⋂ { s0 |(hs0 ⊆ s0 ∧ Tr(s0))})
  eqeq12d((TC ` hs0), ⋂ { s0 |(hs0 ⊆ s0 ∧ Tr(s0))}, (TC ` c0), ⋂ { s0 |(c0 ⊆ s0 ∧ Tr(s0))}, hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, ctc)
  inteqd({ s0 |(hs0 ⊆ s0 ∧ Tr(s0))}, { s0 |(c0 ⊆ s0 ∧ Tr(s0))}, hs0 = c0)
  abbidv(s0, hs0 = c0, (hs0 ⊆ s0 ∧ Tr(s0)), (c0 ⊆ s0 ∧ Tr(s0)))
  anbi1d(hs0 = c0, hs0 ⊆ s0, Tr(s0), c0 ⊆ s0)
  sseq1(hs0, c0, s0)
  mp2an((TC ` hs0)= ⋂ { s0 |(hs0 ⊆ s0 ∧ Tr(s0))}, hs0 ∈ 𝕌, ⋂ { s0 |(hs0 ⊆ s0 ∧ Tr(s0))} ∈ 𝕌)
  tz9.1c(s0, hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  fvmpt2(hs0, universe, ⋂ { s0 |(hs0 ⊆ s0 ∧ Tr(s0))}, universe, ctc)
  df-tc(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((TC ` c0)= ⋂ { s0 |(c0 ⊆ s0 ∧ Tr(s0))})
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: tcid

blocks.name: tctr
blocks.content: Defining property of the transitive closure function: it is transitive. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jun-2013.)

thm tctr(class c0) {
  |- wtr(cfv(ctc, c0))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wtr(cfv(ctc, c0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  mpbiri(wcel(c0, universe), wtr(cfv(ctc, c0)), wtr(cint(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)))))))
  mprg(hs1, cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)))), wtr(cint(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)))))), wtr(cv(hs1)))
  trint(hs1, cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)))))
  simprbi(wcel(cv(hs1), cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))))), wtr(cv(hs1)), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))
  elab(hs0, cv(hs1), wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))), wa(wss(c0, cv(hs1)), wtr(cv(hs1))))
  vex(hs1)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)), wss(c0, cv(hs1)), wtr(cv(hs1)))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0)
  treq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  syl(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wtr(cfv(ctc, c0)), wtr(cint(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))))))), wceq(cfv(ctc, c0), cint(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)))))))
  tcvalg(hs0, c0, universe)
  treq(cfv(ctc, c0), cint(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))))))
  mpbiri(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wtr(cfv(ctc, c0)), wtr(emptycls))
  tr0()
  syl(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wb(wtr(cfv(ctc, c0)), wtr(emptycls)), wceq(cfv(ctc, c0), emptycls))
  fvprc(c0, ctc)
  treq(cfv(ctc, c0), emptycls)
  diff.hs1.c(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)))))

  diff.hs0.w(wa(wss(c0, cv(hs1)), wtr(cv(hs1))))

}

thm tctr(class c0) {
  ⊢ Tr((TC ` c0))
} = {
  pm2.61i(Tr((TC ` c0)), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  mpbiri(c0 ∈ 𝕌, Tr((TC ` c0)), Tr(⋂ { hs0 |(c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}))
  mprg(hs1, { hs0 |(c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}, Tr(⋂ { hs0 |(c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}), Tr(hs1))
  trint(hs1, { hs0 |(c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))})
  simprbi(hs1 ∈ { hs0 |(c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}, Tr(hs1), c0 ⊆ hs1)
  elab(hs0, hs1, (c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0)), (c0 ⊆ hs1 ∧ Tr(hs1)))
  vex(hs1)

blocks.name: tc2

(Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jun-2013.)

  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
} = {
  3eqtr4ri((TC ` { c0 }), ((TC ` c0)⋃ { c0 }), ⋂ { hs0 |(c0 ∈ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}, ⋂ { hs0 |({ c0 } ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))})
  inteqi({ hs0 |(c0 ∈ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}, { hs0 |({ c0 } ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))})
  abbii(hs0, (c0 ∈ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0)), ({ c0 } ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0)))
  anbi1i(c0 ∈ hs0, Tr(hs0), { c0 } ⊆ hs0)
  snss(c0, hs0)
  tc2(hs0, c0)
  ax-mp((TC ` { c0 })= ⋂ { hs0 |({ c0 } ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}, { c0 } ∈ 𝕌)
  snex(c0)
  tcvalg(hs0, { c0 }, universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ c0 })
}

blocks.name: tcss
blocks.content: The transitive closure function inherits the subset relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jun-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm tcss(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cfv(ctc, c0), cfv(ctc, c1)))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
} = {
  eqsstrd(cfv(ctc, c0), cfv(ctc, c1), cint(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))))), wss(c0, c1))
  syl(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(ctc, c0), cint(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  ssex(c0, c1)
  tcvalg(hs0, c0, universe)
  syl6sseqr(cint(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))))), cfv(ctc, c1), cint(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))))), wss(c0, c1))
  syl(wss(c0, c1), wss(cint(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))))), cint(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)))))), wss(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)))), cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))))))
  ss2abdv(hs0, wss(c0, c1), wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))), wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))))
  anim1d(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))
  sstr2(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  intss(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)))), cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)))))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(ctc, c1), cint(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  tcvalg(hs0, c1, universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tcss(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊆ c1 →(TC ` c0)⊆(TC ` c1))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
} = {
  eqsstrd((TC ` c0), (TC ` c1), ⋂ { hs0 |(c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}, c0 ⊆ c1)
  syl(c0 ⊆ c1, (TC ` c0)= ⋂ { hs0 |(c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  ssex(c0, c1)
  tcvalg(hs0, c0, universe)
  syl6sseqr(⋂ { hs0 |(c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}, (TC ` c1), ⋂ { hs0 |(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}, c0 ⊆ c1)
  syl(c0 ⊆ c1, ⋂ { hs0 |(c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))} ⊆ ⋂ { hs0 |(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}, { hs0 |(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))} ⊆ { hs0 |(c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))})
  ss2abdv(hs0, c0 ⊆ c1, (c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0)), (c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0)))
  anim1d(c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆ hs0, Tr(hs0), c0 ⊆ hs0)
  sstr2(c0, c1, hs0)
  intss({ hs0 |(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}, { hs0 |(c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))})
  ax-mp((TC ` c1)= ⋂ { hs0 |(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  tcvalg(hs0, c1, universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ⊆ c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: tcel
blocks.content: The transitive closure function converts the element relation to the subset relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jun-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm tcel(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cfv(ctc, c0), cfv(ctc, c1)))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
} = {
  eqsstrd(cfv(ctc, c0), cfv(ctc, c1), cint(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  tcvalg(hs0, c0, c1)
  syl6sseqr(cint(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))))), cfv(ctc, c1), cint(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cint(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))))), cint(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)))))), wss(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)))), cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))))))
  ss2abdv(hs0, wcel(c0, c1), wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))), wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))))
  jca2(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))), wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)))
  impd(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))
  syl6com(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wi(wtr(cv(hs0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cv(hs0)))
  ssel(c1, cv(hs0), c0)
  com12(wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))
  trss(cv(hs0), c0)
  simpr(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)))
  intss(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)))), cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)))))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(ctc, c1), cint(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  tcvalg(hs0, c1, universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tcel(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(TC ` c0)⊆(TC ` c1))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
} = {
  eqsstrd((TC ` c0), (TC ` c1), ⋂ { hs0 |(c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}, c0 ∈ c1)
  tcvalg(hs0, c0, c1)
  syl6sseqr(⋂ { hs0 |(c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}, (TC ` c1), ⋂ { hs0 |(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}, c0 ∈ c1)
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, ⋂ { hs0 |(c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))} ⊆ ⋂ { hs0 |(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}, { hs0 |(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))} ⊆ { hs0 |(c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))})
  ss2abdv(hs0, c0 ∈ c1, (c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0)), (c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0)))
  jca2(c0 ∈ c1, (c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0)), c0 ⊆ hs0, Tr(hs0))
  impd(c0 ∈ c1, c1 ⊆ hs0, Tr(hs0), c0 ⊆ hs0)
  syl6com(c0 ∈ c1, c1 ⊆ hs0, (Tr(hs0)→ c0 ⊆ hs0), c0 ∈ hs0)
  ssel(c1, hs0, c0)
  com12(c0 ∈ hs0, Tr(hs0), c0 ⊆ hs0)
  trss(hs0, c0)
  simpr(c1 ⊆ hs0, Tr(hs0))
  intss({ hs0 |(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}, { hs0 |(c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))})
  ax-mp((TC ` c1)= ⋂ { hs0 |(c1 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))}, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  tcvalg(hs0, c1, universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
